stories.headline: EU Leaders Agree on New Common Security and Defense Strategy
stories.summary: European Union leaders reached a landmark agreement on a unified defense framework, aiming to bolster regional stability and collective response capabilities.

stories.headline: Global Tech Firms Launch AI Ethics Pact and Open-Source Safety Initiative
stories.summary: Leading tech companies signed a pact for ethical AI development and pledged to open-source key AI safety research, promoting responsible innovation.

stories.headline: US Federal Reserve Signals Potential Interest Rate Hike Amid Inflation
stories.summary: The Federal Reserve indicated a possible interest rate increase, citing persistent inflationary pressures. This could impact global markets and consumer spending.

stories.headline: Breakthrough Malaria Vaccine Shows High Efficacy in African Trials
stories.summary: Phase 3 clinical trials for a new malaria vaccine in Africa reported significantly high efficacy rates, offering immense hope for disease eradication.

stories.headline: Severe Drought Grips Southeast Asia, Raising Food Security Concerns
stories.summary: An extended period of severe drought across multiple Southeast Asian countries is causing widespread crop failures and escalating concerns over food security.
